 Sustainable lithium-ion battery materials and recycling —elevated. 







 


















Ascend Elements is an independent manufacturer of advanced battery materials using valuable elements reclaimed from spent lithium-ion batteries. Our patented Hydro-to-Cathode® direct precursor synthesis process transforms today’s waste into high-value materials for tomorrow’s EV batteries — a giant step up in sustainability for the entire industry.  






Learn more about our products











 











Ascend Elements manufactures advanced battery materials using valuable elements reclaimed from spent lithium-ion batteries. Our patented Hydro-to-Cathode™ process transforms today’s waste into high-value materials for tomorrow’s EV batteries — a giant step up in sustainability for the entire industry. 






Learn more about our products











 











 
 












 


















 








Ascend Elements ranked #1in Automotive on Fast Company’s Most Innovative Companies of 2024 list. 






Read more




















 








Ascend Elements ranked #10 by TIME Magazine as one of America’s Top Green Tech Companies of 2024. 






Read more



































Beyond recycling — we produce sustainable EV battery material. 



We help EV battery manufacturers and end users maximize value. Beyond producing commodity metals, we use advanced particle engineering techniques to transform used Li-ion batteries and manufacturing scrap into highly engineered precursor (pCAM) and cathode active materials (CAM) that meet client specifications.
Our full-service logistics, materials-tracking and customer support services simplify the pursuit of greater sustainability and higher value. 












                     Recovery rate                 



















                     Peace of mind                 

















Learn more about our services















 



Advanced technology elevates e-waste into critical battery materials 



Our industry-first, Hydro-to-Cathode® direct precursor synthesis process transforms a mixed input of discarded batteries and manufacturing scrap into active cathode battery material – raising the value of critical elements like lithium, cobalt, and nickel – while driving down cost and carbon emissions. 







Lower cost 



for cathode materials 





 











 





Lower CO2 



emissions
  

















 





Shredding 















Our Hydro-to-Cathode® Direct Precursor Synthesis Process 











 



Leaching 







 



Impurity ExtractionDirect Precursor Synthesis  







 



Cathode Production 

















 





Battery Manufacturing 














Learn more about our technology















Sustainability and ESG 



As a climate tech company, we are committed to sustainability and the three pillars of ESG. We believe voluntary actions by industry are essential to avoid the worst impacts of climate change and to advance important social issues. 




 







Learn more about our ESG efforts











 




 













 




It’s our responsibility to rethink our use of energy and resources to help achieve net zero.The Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi) has recognized Ascend Elements’ commitment to setting near term and net zero company wide emissions reductions in line with climate science. This is the first step in our decarbonization journey with SBTi.By committing to set a science-based net zero target aligned with SBTi requirements, we proudly join the United Nations’ Race to Zero campaign. 




 

















With Ascend Elements, the battery materials supply chain is looking up. 







When it comes to meeting the needs of lithium-ion supply chains, Ascend Elements aims higher. We go beyond just recycling, instead upcycling discarded batteries into premium cathode active materials—all at a lower cost and carbon footprint. Our unique Hydro-to-Cathode® direct precursor synthesis process unlocks hidden value to return critical materials back to lithium battery manufacturers. 











With Ascend Elements, the battery materials supply chain is looking up. 







When it comes to meeting the needs of lithium-ion supply chains, Ascend Elements aims higher. We go beyond just recycling, instead upcycling discarded batteries into premium cathode active materials—all at a lower cost and carbon footprint. Our unique recovery and purification process unlocks hidden value to return critical materials back to lithium battery manufacturers.

Patented Hydro-to-Cathode® direct precursor synthesis  process increases material performance and value 







 











 







 







 











 







 Our patented Hydro-to-Cathode® direct precursor synthesis process simplifies recycling and transforms old batteries into sustainable battery materials that rival or surpass the performance of new.  











Reclaiming high-value advanced battery materials—efficiently 



Our advantage starts with a remarkable innovation: Other processes leach metals out of spent battery materials, but our patented Hydro-to-Cathode direct precursor synthesis process leaches out impurities, keeping the valuable metals in solution and eliminating multiple steps in the recycling flow. 



 



 



 











 
 












Elevating the value and sustainability of lithium-ion battery elements 



Traditional lithium-ion recycling processes involve many steps that use a lot of energy. Also, they focus on reclaiming intermediate compounds to sell to commodities markets. Our Hydro-to-Cathode direct precursor synthesis process is more efficient and more sustainable while it returns higher-level materials to the supply chain. Using a life cycle assessment methodology from Argonne National Labs, our process demonstrated significant reductions in all environmental impact categories, when compared with traditional methods. 







 






 



 











Making sustainability pay off: Higher economic return encourages more EV battery recycling 



By delivering engineered materials at lower cost, our Hydro-to-Cathode direct precursor synthesis process greatly improves the cost-effectiveness of battery recycling. Improved economics is the best way to boost battery recycling as the EV market grows, which will reduce the pressure to mine and process raw materials for critical battery applications. In this way, our closed-loop approach is a more direct path toward sustainable stewardship of our natural resources and supply chains, helping society to pursue carbon-neutral goals. 







 







Cathode is the most expensive and carbon-intense material in batteries. Our approach results in: 












                     lower costs                 



















                     lower carbon emissions                 

































Introducing Hydro-to-Anode® graphite purification 



Learn more about our sustainable battery materials and high-value recycling services, including Hydro-to-Cathode® direct precursor synthesis and Hydro-to-Anode® graphite recovery and purification. 














Learn More

Advanced battery materials for high-performance applications 



 Meet your performance and sustainability goals with premium battery materials, sustainably sourced and engineered for high power and long cycle life. 











Upcycled battery materials perform better than new 



With our patented Hydro-to-Cathode® direct precursor synthesis process, our sustainable battery materials can outperform traditional materials made with newly mined and refined metals. In a recent study, battery cells made with our upcycled cathode material exhibited over 50% longer cycle life than traditionally made cells, and power capacity was increased by 88%. 
















                     Longer cycle life                 



















                     Higher power capacity                 


















 




















Cathode active materials manufactured to customer specifications 



Ascend Elements is delivering both precursor (pCAM) and finished cathode materials (CAM) for the lithium-ion battery market that help promote growth of demanding EV market applications.


NMC hydroxide and sintered NMC cathode materials
Various metal ratios including 111, 532, 622, 811
Particle d50 available in both 5-6um and 10-12um
Ask us about our other critical battery materials under development

 






Contact us







 






















Cathode active materials manufactured to customer specifications 



Ascend Elements is delivering both precursors and finished cathode materials for the lithium-ion battery market that help promote growth of demanding EV market applications.NMC hydroxide and sintered NMC cathode materialsVarious metal ratios including 111, 532 and 622Particle d50 available in both 5-6um and 10-12umAsk us about our other critical battery materials under development 






Contact us







 











High-quality commodity materials, sustainably sourced
 



We are also able to deliver commodity materials as intermediate commodity metals for producing battery materials or for use in other applications. Improve your application’s overall sustainability by using materials 100% sourced from recycled lithium-ion batteries. 







 



Cobalt sulfate 







 



Manganese sulfate 







 



Nickel sulfate 







 



Lithium carbonate 















 

				Ascend Elements develops key technologies for full battery circularity returning of active materials back into the supply chain in the most sustainable and responsible way. The investment supports our mission at Hitachi Ventures to solve environmental challenges and reduce carbon emissions.			

Tobias Jahn, Partner at Hitachi Ventures














Contact Ascend Elements to evaluate our premium products 



Let us show you how our products can enhance yours. Our materials experts are ready to answer your questions and arrange for an evaluation. Contact us today.

Full-service EV battery recycling raises the standard 



 We make it much simpler and more economical to recycle discarded lithium-ion batteries and scrap, with convenient logistics operations that span North America and Europe. 









 





up to 90% 



reduced GHG Emissions 









 





up to 98% 



recovery rate 









 





100% 



peace of mind 







 











Responsible recycling services pay off 



We don’t simply raise the bar on recycling, we exceed your expectations. That’s why major cell and automotive OEMs entrust us with recycling contracts. 







 



We guide you through every recycling step for optimal convenience, safety and value. 







 



We take ownership of your materials at the door. 







 



Rest easy with our rigorous controls, secure monitoring, documented chain of custody and 24-hour security. 







 



We ensure the secure destruction of R&D materials and proprietary information. 














Your Expert Guide to EV Battery Recycling 





Ride the incoming wave of end-of-life lithium-ion batteries and maximize the value for your business. 






Learn More














 






 



 



Enjoy the peace of mind and competitive advantage that comes from sustainable, high-value, end-of-life solutions 











Logistics management makes recycling simpler and more efficient. 



We lift the work of logistics and processing off your shoulders. 



Our experienced battery recycling professionals handle all aspects of transportation and recycling. We help you prepare your shipment and provide documentation, including certificates of recycling for traceability and proof of proper disposal. We are fully insured and our internal standards meet or exceed worldwide regulatory requirements. Don’t worry, we’ve got you covered. 



 











 

				What set Ascend Elements apart for us was their technology. The fact they can recycle old chemistries, adjust chemical ratios and re-sell materials into the value chain is very attractive. Compared to other recyclers, Ascend Elements stood apart.			

Bryan Schultz, VP of Technology, Spiers New Technology














Start upcycling your spent lithium-ion batteries. 



Ascend Elements is raising the value of materials in the battery supply chain, sustainably. Learn more about our engineered battery materials , high-value recycling services and fast-growing company . 






Contact us
